In your land there are many sailboats at the upper part of the Nile River.
Your rulers send ambassadors that sail
down the river in papyrus boats.
You messengers to Ethiopia, go quickly!
to people who are tall and who have smooth skin.
People everywhere are afraid of those people,
they live in a land that is divided by branches of one large river.
“Look when I lift up my battle flag on top of the mountain,
and listen when I blow the ram’s horn
to signal that the battle is about to begin
because Yahweh has told me this:
“I will watch quietly from where I live.
I will watch as quietly as [SIM] the heat waves shimmer as they rises on a hot summer day,
as quietly as the dew forms
before the army of Ethiopia starts to attack,
get rid of them like a farmer who
[MET] cuts off the new shoots of the grapevines with his shears,
and prunes the branches that have become very long.
the soldiers in the army of Ethiopia
and their corpses will lie in the fields for vultures to eat their flesh in the ◄summer/hot season►.
At that time, the people of that land that is divided by the branches of that one big river will take gifts to Yahweh in Jerusalem.
Those tall people who have smooth/dark skin, whom people everywhere are afraid of,
because they conquer and destroy many countries,
will take gifts to Jerusalem, the city where the Commander of the armies of angels lives.
